title: Novel CO2-Philic Porous Organic Polymers Synthesized in Water: A Leap towards Eco-Sustainability
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00479E, Paper

Riccardo Mobili, Yue Wu, Charl Bezuidenhout, Sonia La Cognata, Silvia Bracco, Mariolino Carta, Valeria Amendola
We introduce two novel keto-enamine-linked porous organic polymers (POPs) distinguished by the presence of methyl or ethyl groups in their triamine precursors. These innovative POPs can be synthesized efficiently in...
